TopicTitle: Didn't know we were employing giants...

Articles.Content: I guess they WOULD be useful for getting the huge stages we tend to use into position.
Haha, that is very strange. I wonder if that part of the VAB is somehow scaled differently.

Haha, that is very strange. I wonder if that part of the VAB is somehow scaled differently.

Actually, they're nowhere near that part of the VAB. It's just forced perspective - I found them floating in midair and thought it'd make a good screenshot.

If you look carefully, you can see tiny little dots. Those are kerbals that aren't floating in midair.
Actually those are the pilots from the early rockets where they didn't have as much radiation shielding.
They've been exposed to the nuclear engine's radiation.
For a moment I thought you were talking about Squad.
Knew I shouldn't have dropped those nuclear stages on top of the VAB...
